means without written permission sugar shawl by the lamb & kid the sugar shawl is an asymmetric shawl featuring our newest lace weight base sugar in this pattern sugar is held double to achieve a fingering weight gauge we ve paired it with elmer fingering and the resulting fabric is insanely soft and cuddly the sugar shawl combines garter stitch with slip_stitch bands adding texture and interest it is the perfect shawl for experimenting with new base pairings additionally it s lightweight which makes it a great option for transitional weather or a slight breeze in the air finished
